alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 11:00AM CST until March 05 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. James River near Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties. James River at Galena affecting Stone County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. .Runoff from rainfall accumulations of two to three inches with isolated higher amounts will likely lead to the rivers rising above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Boaz. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Low lying areas near the river flood. Flows may be dangerous for canoers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
